name: Get Going Media
description:
We help new and established businesses of all sizes across East Sussex and Kent. As our name suggests, we help people get going online. If you’re a new business in need of a brand new website, or if you’re a business with a website that needs a revamp, we’re excited to work with you to achieve your goals. We would love to hear about your project, so please get in touch using the form below.
If you would prefer to speak to us on the phone, you can call our freephone 0800 number (charges may apply when calling from mobiles). One of our friendly and knowledgeable team will be more than happy to answer any questions you may have.
